home.text_base_description: Gorgeous sunsets and unobstructed S/W views sweeping from South Beach marina, Oracle/ Giants ballpark, the new home of the Warriors-Chase Center and city lights of Twin Peaks. This one bedroom condominium on the 38th floor of the iconic ORH building features bamboo flooring, Del Tongo cabinetry, and designer-Bosch appliances. The bedroom includes a walk in closet and alcove perfect for home office. The attributes of this home range from an in-unit washer and dryer to upgraded designer carpets, granite countertops, and floor-to-ceiling windows. Live, Work and Play among a thriving community at One Rincon Hill. Google Spear St, Facebook, LinkedIn SF headquarter offices + the Transbay Terminal & SF Moma, ALL within a 6-10 minute walk. Amenities include 24 hour doorman, concierge, full service valet parking, 2 fitness centers, Access to Uncle Harry's Penthouse Lounge.

Transfer of Possession: Close of Escrow
